title: ARC Finance Ltd. plans major expansion, board to meet to consider sub division into FV of Re.1 - ANI News
content: ARC Finance Ltd. plans major expansion, board to meet to consider sub division into FV of Re.1  ANI News
description: New Delhi [India], February 5 (ANI/PNN): BSE listed, ARC Finance Ltd, an NBFC, Non-Deposit taking Non Banking Finance Company engaged primarily in the business of advancing loans and investing/trading in securities has informed the BSE that its board will meet on February 11, 2022, to consider proposal for sub division of equity shares of Rs.10 each to Re.1 each.
